## Spatial -vs- Temporal

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
P1 = 60 %>% mami.codi(verbose=T, num_harmonics=10, octave_ratio=1.9)
```

```{r, echo=T, message=F}
P1$frequencies[[1]]
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
po = P1$frequencies[[1]] %>% pseudo_octaves()
po
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
po$pseudo_octave %>% most_common_pseudo_octave()
```

```{r, echo=T, message=F}
P1$wavelengths[[1]]
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
po = P1$wavelengths[[1]] %>% pseudo_octaves()
po
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
po$pseudo_octave %>% most_common_pseudo_octave()
```
